author: Brittney Stephens
title: Who Is Meghan Markle? Get to Know the Suits Star Who Has Stolen Prince Harry's Heart
text:
Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Who Is Meghan Markle? Get to Know the Suits Star Who Has Stolen Prince Harry's Heart 
Prince Harry is dating American actress Meghan Markle , and after the news broke in late 2016 it didn't take long for most people to ask, "Who is she?!" Well, besides being the young royal's (serious) new love, Meghan has starred on the USA series Suits for over five years. She also happens to be a philanthropist who has done extensive work with children, animals, and women's rights — sound familiar ? Read on for six things you should know about Meghan. Related:
